overview:
With an extensive background architecting, implementing and operating complex, highly scaled, intelligent transaction systems, Chris is a technology leader in advertising, targeting and wireless technologies.

In his role as CTO, Chris leads the development and operations of the companyâ€™s MYDAS advertising platform. His experience includes leading engineering and operations for Advertising.com (acquired by AOL), and CAC2S software engineering with Solipsys (acquired by Raytheon). He has consulted with behavioral targeting companies on the development, integration, and implementation of targeting technologies.
